snippet: John C. Hirsh of Georgetown University writes that “it is a great pity” that Turkey continues to object to “the verdict of history” regarding its mass killings of Armenians at the start of the last century.
lead_paragraph: John C. Hirsh of Georgetown University writes that “it is a great pity” that Turkey continues to object to “the verdict of history” regarding its mass killings of Armenians at the start of the last century.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
